name: Accessibility Compliance Check
description: Audits tinyland.dev for WCAG accessibility violations. Analyzes Svelte components for ARIA attributes, semantic HTML, keyboard navigation, and color contrast issues.
process: Resolve github-token via juggler_resolve_composite for GitHub API access
Fetch all .svelte and .html files from tinyland.dev via GitHub API
Analyze for missing ARIA attributes (role, aria-label, aria-describedby)
Check for semantic HTML usage (nav, main, aside, header, footer vs div-soup)
Verify keyboard navigation patterns (tabindex, focus management, skip links)
Cross-reference with tinyland-a11y-engine rules and store violation report with WCAG level references (A, AA, AAA)

metrics.successCriteria: All Svelte components analyzed, WCAG violations categorized
